content.detailedDescription:
I exited the "p" street exit off of buiness 80 west into downtown sacramento & stopped at the light off the exit for approx. 2 min. while waiting, i noticed a very amber/dark orange light in the sky above me. it twinkled a bit, but not for long. at first i thought it must be some sort of airplane or helicopter but then it started to make very sudden zig zag movements to the right and then vanished into the clear sky. (dispite all the bad weather lately, it was actually one of the clearest nights in sacramento, ca in a while!)
once the light i was stopped at turned green & i began to drive toward home, i continued to try & locate what i had seen, but it never appeared the rest of the way home. (about 10 min.) i have seen many falling stars, bright planets/bright twinkling stars/ helicopters/airplanes w/ blinking lights etc...This was nothing of the sort. it was very distinct! and very unusual. as much as i do believe in the possibility of ufo's, i've always been extremely skeptical! 
this sighting however, actually proved to me that something is definitely out there. i was not afraid, i could not wait to get home & tell my husband who is very fasinated w/ such things. he always talks about things he reads regarding ufo's and is always trying to get me more interested in looking at the stars etc...Just for scientific education. we both have always found crop circles to be very amazing & interesting! so upon telling him my experience, he suggested that i write to you. hopefully my story can spark some interest into possible ufo's and the sacramento, ca area.


(a sketch of my experience is coming soon)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Amber colored light zig zagged across sky & disappeared

content.detailedDescription: In 1974, i lived in huntsville ala. on monte sano blvd. located on a small mount overlooking grass valley. it was about 1 or 1:30 am, i was in the study doing homework and noticed that the neighborhoods dogs were all howling. i went outside to investigate what might be causing all of the animals to behave as such. i listened for distant sirens and all was quiet except for the howling dogs. looking sw,and two bright lights cought my attention. they were coming toward where i was standing in front of the house. the night sky was clear and starlighted. the two white lights (halogen like) continued to approach, and as they grew nearer i felt slight rush of fear. i stood and watched as they passed directly overhead with the realization that this was not an airplane. the object seemed very large, did not make any sound as it glided overhead. as it passed i noticed that the objects shape was clearly visible against the starlit sky. it was shaped similar to our modern stealth bomber, but much larger. it had on front the two bright white lights and lights near the wing tips underneath similar to running lights, (the one on the right was yellow-green and the left was violet-blue). there were no other visible lights on the object. looking up at it as it passed you could see shimmering lights as if the stars above were shining through the skin of the aircraft. a few minutes later, looking toward the same direction this object came from, i spotted another pair of lights. as these grew nearer i could hear the sound of jet engines and could see as they flew overhead that they were a pair of military fighter aircraft, seemingly tailing the other object. the direction and path that this event happened in nearly followed the exact path that a tornado did during the super weather event of april 4,1974. when it was all quiet again i went back inside and wondered who to call to report what i witnessed. i called a local fm radio station, reported the incident to the female night dj, asked if there were any other people with similar reports. the response was no, and she proceeded to announce on air a reference to my call and her wanting to smoke what ever she assumed the excited caller had been smoking (which i was not!). since that time, whenever i'm involved in conversation on the subject of unexplained phenomenon, i have told others my personal observation and get a reaction similar to what i recieved that night from the radio dj.
content.summary: Clear moonless night, was doing homework, heard neighborhood dogs howling, went to investigate and noticed off in distance what appeared to be aircraft landing lights approaching.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from returning two videos to hollywood video, just a few minutes ago, and as i always do when driving on that street, i looked out east when i got to the top of the hill. i noticed an unusual light pattern flying over and then east of my location (southeastern colorado springs, in the widefield/security suburb). it was triangular, with solid white lights on the three corners of the triangle, and a flashing red light in the center. the object was flying slowly, and moving almost due east. 

i live near an airport and am very familiar with the various types of airplanes and what they look like at night. this was no airplane, at least not one in use by that airport. 

there were no unusual feelings accompanying this sighting. 

i lost sight of the object when the houses i was driving past obscured it, and by that point it was too far out east for me to be able to get my nikon and take a photo. i always carry a small point-and-shoot digital camera with me, but it wouldn't have been able to take any kind of decent photo of the night sky.

this seems to be a standard "black triangle" type ufo.
content.summary: Triangular ufo seen flying east

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were outside on our patio having a cigarette. we see many airplane and helicopter lights at night as we live only 3 miles south of i-94 and survival flight copters travel the highway for traffic accidents. the detroit metro airport is less than an hour away as well.

a survival flight happened to be traveling west bound parallel with i-94 that night and i looked up to watch for a second. after the helicopter was past, i noticed another object just south of the path the copter had just taken, but it was not making any noise and was not moving as fast as all other airplanes and copters we normally see. we can always hear the copters and most airplanes depending on how high they are in the sky. this object was moving slow and steady and making no noise.

the lights on the object were also different. there were three i could see making the shape of a triangle, hence the reason i think the object itself was shaped like a triangle. the lights were dimmer - kind of hazy, not blinking and larger in diameter than lights on airplanes and copters. i couldn't guess as to how close the object was due to it being dark.

i said to my husband, "what the hell is that? do you see that?" and even tried to point it out to him to see, my finger following it's path as it traveled, but he didn't see it. by the time he focused in on the area i was pointing to (remember it was dark), the object was gone.

the last thing i saw was it rotating slightly to the left - looking like it tipped toward the sky and disappeared.

i asked my husband if he knew of anything shaped like that and was silent while in flight. i explained what i saw to him and he said nothing came to mind that he knew of. he's an army kid and is a military weapons and aircraft buff - believe me we watch a lot of the military channel due to this passion.

now i've never before seen anything like this. i've never witnesses anything i couldn't explain away thinking it was something military or the like. i do believe there could be other types of intellegance out there, but have never seen anything personally that would back up this thought. i'm a sane person and hold a good job. i have a level head and would usually blow something like this off, but it keeps popping up in my mind what i saw and i just needed to see if anyone else saw the same thing in my area.

i really did not know where to look for reports like this in my area as there are so many sites online that cover this topic. as always, you never know which sites are the most respectable or reputable. i hope yours is one of them. :)
content.summary: Witnessed triangular object with dim lights on corners moving across the sky to the east at a steady but slower speed. object rotated slightly and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: This thing was spotted mid-day near rt 4 by jungle jim's in fairfield. it was seen by multiple people in the area and was captured by many onlookers i think. people were stopping in the street to look at it. i filmed this using my cellphone camera so its grainy. (sorry i know they are always grainy!) but this thing hovered around then zipped away. it looked like it had tentacles on it or something.
content.summary: Disc with tenicles seen near jungle jims in fairfield (video)

content.detailedDescription:
I am now 66 years old.  this happened when i was 6 or 7 years old at my aunt's home in cheviot, ohio.  i have told this story to many people in my life and everyone has thought that i have made this up.  a friend of mine told me about your network and so i am going to try again.  i guess it is because my life is growing short that i want to make a real effort to tell my story.  

can't tell you the time of day really but it was around mid morning and i was visiting my aunt.  her home at that time was in the country in cheviot, ohio. their garage/basement was built under there house which is where i was when this happened.  i was playing with my aunt's music box.  my back was to the garage door (which was open) when i felt like something was wrong.  i turned toward the open door and there was a creature there looking at me.  i don't know just how tall i was at that time but it seemed to be my size.  it's head was larger than it's body with large eyes, small arms and what looked to be hands, stuped over slightly.  the most strange part about this figure was that i could see it's veins.  don't remember it's feet.  i remember just standing there looking at this creature for the longest time and it me, (must have been just seconds) i did'nt feel frightened but i wanted my aunt to see this so i turned and ran up the basement stairs into the kitchen where my aunt was and by the time i conveniced her to go down to the garage the figure was gone. and ofcourse she told me not to go around telling people about what i thought i saw because it was just all in my head. until the day that i die i will remember this event and wonder just what that creature was thinking when we were just standing there looking at each other.

i hope you believe me and if you do you will be the first.
content.summary: Creature not ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Myrtle beach, sc 1/30/2008 9:30pm est:  my husband and i went outside, on our porch like we do every evening.  our porch faces the southern skies, and since we live on a dark street, we enjoy watching the stars, listening to crickets and enjoying the evening.  tonight tho, it was unusually quiet.  i did hear neighbors dogs barking, and my dog, a maltese was barking also.  at 9:45, my cat was at the door, wanting to go in, which is unusual for her, since she is a predominantly outdoor cat. at about 9:50pm i kept noticing an object in the sky, with red and white lights, sometimes an orange-like light would blink.  it was about 1/4 the size of a full moon, disc shaped and the lights were arround the entire object.  it was about 10x larger than the brightest biggest star in the sky, and appeared motionless for about 15 minutes.  my husband, who does not believe in ufo's stood in disbelief at what we were seeing, and ran inside to find binoculars.  i continued to watch the object, almost in a trance.  i marked a banister on my porch, to see if the object was moving at all, and after 15 minutes, it seemed to be moving in a south-southeast direction at a very slow pace.  it stopped again for about 5 minutes. i called my neighbor at 9:57pm and she came running over.  she also witnessed this and just kept saying "that is so weird." she watched for about 10 minutes and went home to tell her husband.  my husband came outside, unable to find the binoculars, and saw it was still out there.  he went in to take an incoming phone call.  still watching, i observed a shooting star, just below this object, and for 2 minutes the object seemed to be blinking more.  then it disappeared.

i was in complete awe of this sighting.  at first i wanted to run inside and watch from inside, but i was almost in a trance, watching, in disbelief.  i knew from the first sighting that it wasnt an airplane.  we live between myrtle beach and charleston airports, and i often see planes at night and day.  this was definitly not an airplane.  they move and this object was stationary for a very long time.  

i wish i had a camera with a high zoom, so i could have proof of my sighting.  i did send an email to ireport@cnn.Com, but received no response.
content.summary: Sighting in myrtle beach, sc.  seen in the south, south-east skies.  a disc-like object was observed, with a couple red and white lights, and an almost orange colored blinking light.  there were many lights, and appeared to be around the entire object.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw object 60 to 70 yards in length square/rectangular with rounded corner just below treetop level about 10 feet in the air...And creature approached me having dark eyes that curved, large head, very slim body, slightly musclular...Creature talked to me by telepathy for approx 3 hours. 

he realized after these conversations that they have been watching us for many many years, checking out our culture, our reactions to things and events. helping with our help....
content.summary: I was approached by one creature about 4'5

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were having a party inside. we had partied for about 2 hours when we heard a ear splitting screeching noise. we ran outside to the field next to my pond. half in and out of the pond was a giant disk. it was a like a metalic color it never stayed one color for to long. then there was a giant flash of light next thing i remember my friends and i saw six bipedial humonoid benings doing reprodution expirements on us.
then i woke up in my house and it was 4:oo a.M we haven't realy talked about it since 

i have inclosed my email address so that any who are curious can contact me:thefrikinshizz@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Giant disk with rotating light patterns round the edge probalbly 50 ft.

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:15 10:30 pm eastern time i was sitting on my porch looking out over my street in front of my house there is a small intersection in front of the house and a couple of trees telephone poles etc.. hangin out with my brother and a couple of freinds just talking i notice somthing in the northern direction of the sky it cought my eye becouse of how bright it was i was like wat is that can u see that every one looks this objest was getting brighter and brighter coming towards us and earth it enters the atmosphere and levels off at like 35 40 thousand feet at this point the objest is very bright due to atmosphere entry it stopes and sites there then begines to move slowly it appears to be strguling to get moving again sort of jumping around left to right direction looked like it turned into a blur then it shot off back to the north at the speed of light or faster this thing left a blue streek in its path like somthing from star treck i follwed the blue streek it left until it disappered into a pin head and was gone it was unbeleivable i have watched the sky ever since it was real me and 3 other people saw it ill never forget for the rest of my life i have been made fun of for talking about it , it made me realize that anything u can think of is possible !!!
content.summary: Real un identified object

content.detailedDescription:
I let my dog out to do his busness and went out to enjoy the night air . i noticed a completly silent unfamiliar glowing object in the eastern night sky between my house and downtown jacksonville . i got my 10 power binoculars and looked at it . it seemed to be a glowing saucer shaped object with some energy strings with what seemed to be bright bits of light going up and down comming out of the bottom into a ring area that constricted the "strings" then just below this these string of light spread out in a cone shape and got less btight the futher away from the ring area they got .This light formation underneath seemed to scan back and forth and right to left under the scaucer shape like it was looking for somwthing or maybe making a complet scan of the area . i went in the house and got my old digital camera and got three photos . the object stayed in sight for about 15-20 minutes . 
in my area i have seen many types of airplanes including the stealth bomber and fighter all sorts of other military and civilion aircraft including many different helicopters from the navy bases around here . i also have seen weather ballons , the blimps that come around for football games and hot air ballons . this did not match anything i have ever seen in person or on tv . heck it didn't match anything i have seen on science fiction programs or movies .
i have three raw photos some blowen up and some crude computer drawings of what the heck ever it was i saw . it looks like there is only three places to leave attachments and i have a couple more images that serve to show what i saw better if yall would like 'em .
best regards,
walter howell
content.summary: Glowing disk shaped object with some kind of cone shaped light formation comming out of the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: It is out and 2 of the same one on each side of the dipper
content.summary: It is out now

content.detailedDescription: Ok, here goes,  have  three  other witness's  who were with me at the time. i live in the country, there are some days, the airforce have dogfights at night, using flares,  and  there is air- freight company in  wilminton, ohio. i look out the back deck and  saw air  craft lights, i thought another test fight between aircraft. i grab  my  cameras..35 mm. " raymond , ryan " & "naomi".. ask where  are you going ?  i said, loks  like another dog  fight".  i  was " wrong".. there were  {5 } aircraft,  buzzing  the  field,  suddenly, { 3 }  other aircraft tured on their lights  from  across the  field,  and  join  the other,  but these craft were  going very slow also .  these craft went up and down  and  side ways.. they   were dipping  low in  the ravine  & comimg  up  very  slow.  one  craft would  move slighty,  then go back to where it  was. i have photo's, but  they  are time lasp.Here comes the interested  parts..Everytime a  cargo jet would come by...These  things  would turn off there  lights, and then turn them on again when  the jets left. thir lights would go from dim  to bright...This  went on  for  hours,  along  with a  few  meteors.  i  went  out  into  the  field and  yes,  i was  armed"  i  walked out  about  300  yards,  and  the  things  turned  off  their lights, or  dim  them very low...So  i  came  back,  the  boys  ask  me  ' what  is  going  on,  i  said  , i don't know, but it looks  like  they  are looking  for  something  over ther. these  guys  are  19 years old. at  4 am in  the  morning the  guys were still  up" scared, or  worried,  , because one light was still out in the field, diming it's light evertime an aircraft would  go by. next morning there were lots military aircraft"   there  was no noise  from the  crafts.  if  want  want  the  photo's,  you  can  have  them, or  would you  like the negatives. my hobbies are,  amature astrophotography, and  some  lapidary ..I  have newspapers, with my photo's, that  i have taken.."comets"  luner  eclipes,...My new phone number is now 937 -648 -7507...Moved to dayton..Temporary
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lots   of  unknowns    aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were camping at baker lake, wa, with the family.  we were outside in sleeping bags, looking at the stars - you know, how you make shapes with the stars - there was a triangle up above - gradually, we noticed the long end of the triangle had elongated - that was strange - and it was squiggling.  next, we saw what we thought was a light-house on the island in the lake - bright - like a star - but gradually, it too, became higher and higher over the island - slowly - so slowly, it squiggled over to the "star" of the triangle that had moved - elongated - this took several hours - then suddenly - like a flash - another "star" shot up over the island - incredibly fsst - then it took many minutes to "squiggle" over to the other two bright objects - they were now in a little triangle of their own - then they "squiggled" off together - so slowly, that you didn't even realize they were moving, except to see the distance now between other objects in the sky - so sneaky - at one point, they all shot out colored beams - green? red? blue?  i don't quite remember - exept i ran into my folks' trailer and told them there were some ufo's in the sky - dad's response: if they offer you a ride, say no.  the next morning, when my sister and i recouted the story, he was irritated that we didn't wake him up - but we did try!!!!  
what was that?  i have known all my life that it was not any airplanes, satellites, or anything that we have.  they were able to change course on a dime - and they were so danged sneaky - moving so slowly - and then so fast when they wanted to....?  squiggling off into oblivion.  all together like they were meeting up.....
content.summary: Things moving so quickly - changing paths on a dime - or so slowly you couldn't even see them until you realized the "constellation" had changed

content.detailedDescription: South of de leon, texas, i was driving my car on highway 16 south, to go to my home at lake proctor. when suddenly, i saw one large orange colored round craft appear to the west of me, and then a smaller orange colored round craft appeared east of the larger craft. then suddenly, the smaller craft merged with the larger craft and left an orange comet trail when it entered the other craft. when i first saw this happening, i knew it was u.F.O., and not flares, or any type of aircraft. i also looked to see if there were any aircraft around the crafts and there wasn't. i was stunned, because it happened so quickly.
content.summary: Two huge orange glowing objects, round in shape. one moving west, other stationary, the moving object "went" into the stationary craft and both instantly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
The craft at first appeared to be an unusually bright and twinkling star. which caught my eye shortly after returning from work and bringing in some firewood. so i watched it for a good min or so. before deciding it was not any celestial body i was familiar with and seemed too deliberate in it's "twinkle". the object was obviously high above the earth and did not appear to be  moving from it's general position. which was not far above the tree line and to the se of my position when first noticed it.
  
  i went and grabbed my astronomical binoculars and returned with it not having appeared to move. i focused on the craft and clearly made out intense bright lights which varied in pattern and color. the colors appeared to be red, green and white. the white light seemed particularly intense. there was a variation in speed of color change and pattern change. as well as varied patterns. though hard to be certain it did appear to be a circle perhaps a sphere? but due to some of the patterns and the manner they appeared it seemed a circle. honestly hard to be sure of a dark shape against a dark sky. 
 
 the lights however were very visible and easy to make out as well as certain patterns. for example a circle of light alone made up of lights appearing to be on the edge of the craft. as well as patterns appearing on what appeared to be the bottom and a mixture of the two. it did seem to move but not in a rotational "flying" manner. it seemed to only move across the sky very slow as though stationary. as it was first noticed from the front walk and was followed over the hours to the side and back. 
 
  there was another witness whom i called out to confirm what i was seeing and followed it off and on for the duration as well. they too used astronomical binoculars and actually were kind of startled. they could make out the lights and the changing of patterns and intensity as well. though never under the impression that it was the iss as i have observed it. we confirmed the iss was not in the area. further when it is it does not exactly linger. likewise with satellites which it could not be for several reasons. nor was it any type of airplane or helicopter. first it was far too high and second i live near an airport. i know what a plane and a chopper in the sky look like. not to mention both actually went by as well in the course of the night and the difference was glaring to say the least.
 
  the sighting actually continues as i write this. this is now 1-30-08. it appeared in the same place and followed the same path tonight. i would imagine it could have been there last night too. it was overcast so i don't know.
content.summary: Object appears to twinkle brightly in orbit to the eye, but through binoculars is bright lights in patterns.

content.detailedDescription: The last several nights i have seen several objects in the sky. very far away but extremely bright fast blinking lights changing colors appears to skip across the sky. i saw several, about 4 come together over route 42 ac expressway. then a low flying aircraft flew above the tree line over my house, i couldn't make out the exact shape but the front was in a v shape with lights across it. i didn't hear much sound. it then flew and joined the other objects in the sky. the next night i went outside and saw 2 objects in the same spot as the night before but hovering lower to the ground and closer in distance to me. ever since i have been scared and can't sleep. please check this out.
content.summary: Large object maybe a plane flying low lights all around front

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, son, daughter and one of our neighbors children were returning home to roberts, wi from a fireworks display we had attended in st. paul, mn.

as i started down the approach to the bridge which crosses the st. croix river into wi i noticed a bright light just above the bluff on the wi side.
i drove this highway every day, as i worked in st. paul, but had never seen a light that bright there before.

i nugged my wife and ask her if she had ever seen a light there before and she was as surpised as i was when she then spotted it.

we were crossing the bridge now and when we were about 3/4 of the way across the light started to move from its position northeast of us, moving in a southwesterly direction. it was moving in a direction that would take it right over the top of us. by this time i was almost at a dead stop on the bridge.

as it got close we were able to clearly see that it was a large craft, triangular in shape, not a sharply angled triangle, but rounded on the nose. the size appeared to be about the length of a dc10, and the width about the wingspan of a dc10

the lights from the bridge lit up the belly of the craft. it was metalic in color. my wife ask me what all those things on the belly were. instead of a simple smooth surface it had all kinds of structure on the belly, some like barrels, some like piping, and other unknown structure.

the craft made absolutely no noise. it was moving at about 10 mph. it was approximately 250-300 feet above us. i feel pretty comfortable with the altitude as that is approximatly the hieght of the bluff it was hovered initially over.

we watched it for about 20 seconds. i then took off for a wayside stop on the top of the bluff on the wi side. i pulled into the wayside, took out the binoculars i had with me, and watched the craft continue to travel on a strait line. it did not change altitude. on the rear of the craft i could see two red glows, not like lights. my impression is that they were some sort of propulsion. the did not emit any vapor or other material but appear to be pulsing. the craft just faded away in the dark.

i would estimate that the total elapsed time from first spotting it to termination at about 10 minutes. 

all five of us saw the object. none of us had ever seen anything before that we thought was a ufo. this object was definately not an aircraft, not a blimp or ballon, or any kind of glider.

i guess we all had a sense of bewelderment, knowing we had seen something that no of us could expain, yet knowing full well that we did see it and that it was real.
content.summary: Ufo spotted low over hudson, wi

content.detailedDescription: 2nd event was a day later out facing baltimore,the naked eye looked like a flicker star looked thru scope and saw the same.. a few days ago saw it out my back window again at 3 am got the scope and it was round shacking on a hale pivital motion with a crack of light near the bottom. as i watched it had three black oval like shapes one at 12 and the other at4 and8. they moved across the cicle to the crack of light, all then forming one black area. then it was shaking and looked as if something was shadowing it and was not round and formed into what looked like a skull or allien shape with a small black circle at the left side above the middle...Very creapy...No one  can tell me what it is...Have you had any other sittings like this?
content.summary: 1st time it was a ficker star next to the dipper. looked in telescope and it was round with various colors of lighting thru the center. northern  w direction.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my hunting buddy were going in field to hunt deer about 6 am to630 am walking west to east when we saw a vary brite light eastern sky it was moving in a upward motion the light was so bright we didnt know what it might be. the light stop't moveing up; leveld off and flew northeast for a few minutes.There was very little clowd cover, but there was a small clowd in the path of the light,the light whent behind the clowd and almost like the light shut off it was not there anymore. you could see something in front of the light oval shape, my buddy and i did video a few minutes,we were dumfounded not ever seeing anything like that before. we have showed many peapal, some say it was a meter but most dont have an anser what it might be.
content.summary: Brightest  light  i  ever  saw

content.detailedDescription:
Carolyn
while my husband and i were on the way to the movie, i noticed a blimp like shape in the sky.  thinking it was an advertisement from the blimp from the old albertsons store (park and n.W. highway), we drove to check it out thinking how cool it was that is was all lit up.  once we got to that location, there was no blimp to be found.  however, the blimp like object was still visible.  it appeared to have very bright lights all around it and lights going through the center.  i remember them being more green neon color in the center and white everywhere else. it pretty much stayed in the same location while we were looking at it.   i kept trying to figure out if it said something. never could figure it out. it was so large that i thought that some place locally  was advertising. we  were only there for maybe 5 minutes. not putting much more thought into it, my husband and i went off to see our movie which started at 7:05 pm.  it took us about 20-25 minutes to get to the movies. so i would say that we saw the blimp like object around 6:40 pm.

the next day we  heard about the ufo sighting in stephenville and realized that what we saw must have been the ufo.  the lights were too bright for it to be an airplane of any kind.  we looked stephenville up on the map and sure enough it was that exact direction that we were looking when we saw the blimp like object the night before. it's to coincidental that we saw something within the same time and same direction that the residents of stephenville did.  a ufo never even entered our minds at the time.  but, i am a firm believer that what we saw was the same thing that was seen in stephenville 100 miles away.

i used to not think anything about ufo's.  i really didn't believe in them.  now after that experience on january 8th, 2008 i am a believer that there are ufo's.  not necessarily extra-terrestrial, but something.

glenn
i confirm everything that carolyn said above and i wanted to add that i was driving and did not get to look at the object the entire time. i did get a good look at it when we arrived at the albertsons parking lot. we live by dfw airport and are very used to seeing aircraft of all kinds (every 5 mins or so). i was a redeye gunner while in the u.S. army and received aircraft recognition training. this was in no way any aircraft i have ever seen. the entire time i saw the object it did not move, completely stationary.
i have included a photoshop drawing of what we both agree we saw.
content.summary: Observed a blimp shaped object with extremely bright lights.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Ok, saturday evening dec 29th 2007 was when i first started to record these objects, but i've seen them on and off for at least two years. they appear as balls of light/flame, they brighten up at first and then kind of fizzle down before they start to move. at first they would stay in the same area, but after watching them over the course of 26 days (on and off) i've seen them travel around allover, some of them  look like headlights in the dark, some of them are triangles, they change color and shape.I dont know if its some kind of government experiment, or if its something else, all i know is that i have something very strange on video im not computer literate so i dont know how to transfer from my dvd recorder to files i can send online. how can we work something out so that someone can come check them out? i work in mid town manhattan.
im also a mufon member.

-ryan
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo/goverment experiment? bronx. new york

content.detailedDescription: my son and young daughter was with me on wednesday jan 16  i had just picked my son up from a meeting and was traveling towards the local airport when in the sky appears and orange ball that looked pointed on the top and the size of a small plane the object just appeared out of nowhere. along with that object was a very bright star or planet in the eastern sky that caught our attention at first. then this object appeared over the airport or nys highway 68 heading to canton,ny my son and i both said did you see that it lasted about a minute in duration, other people in the area must have seen it as well. friday night the 18th my wife, son and i were headed to my other sons track meet in canton, ny when we all witnessed the orange light together again just one at first and then up the road we witnessed about 6 orange lights in a horizontal position they appeared and then disappeared very quickly. my wife has been a skeptic and has had a problem with my interest in the ufo's but she even was questioning what it was. again she was blaming the ft. drum scenerio as well.The week before my son was coming back from a track meet on a friday and the whole bus reported seeing something strange that night as well. we lost sight of the objects because they just disappeared.
content.summary: Orange fireballs in ogd,ny

content.detailedDescription: +it was about 8 pm it was dark already and i heard a large amount of jets in the air. so i went outside and started counting the jets i counted approx: 10- or more when i looked west there was a arrow of lights it was 6 to 8 lights that formed a v but the point of the v was headed toward me.  it was much bigger than the jets.  the jets lights in the sky are about half the size of a pencil eraser, this thing was the size of a big pink school eraser.  it was quiet the only thing you could hear was all the jets zooming around this object.  it turned south and then all that you could see is 4 lights, two at each end of the object.  the center was dark.  it slowly moved south, and i lost sight of it because of my neighbors truck.  i had called my husband and daughter out, he saw the object and my daughter saw it after it turned.  most of the jets followed the object, but i watched 2 jets circle the valley for awhile.  this is very unusual i have never seen jets do this here i lived here 12 years. i knew this object wasn't anything i ever seen.  i lived on air force bases for 14 years and i know the difference between aircraft and something unnatural.
content.summary: Arrow of lights moving slow and silent with around 10 jets in the air

content.detailedDescription: 4 bright symetric and equally spaced cone shaped lights climbed from the ground to thousands of feet into the sky until they disappeared at a fast speed west of city abilene.  the lights seemed to instantly vanish like the starship enterprise if you ever watched star trek.  it was around 10pm local time.
content.summary: 4 bright cone shaped lights climbed from the ground at a fast speed west of city

content.detailedDescription: 4 bright symetric and equally spaced cone shaped lights climbed from the ground to thousands of feet into the sky until they disappeared at a fast speed west of city abilene.  the lights seemed to instantly vanish like the starship enterprise if you ever watched star trek.  it was around 10pm local time.
content.summary: 4 bright cone shaped lights climbed from the ground at a fast speed west of city

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 10p.M. in early july 2007 a friend and i were outside looking northbound in the sky near dynette world. all of a sudden a steady bright white light traveled across the sky in a eastern direction for about 20 seconds and all of a sudden the steady bright white light  turned red for about 2 seconds and suddenly took off and disappeared. a couple seconds later we spotted a steady tiny red dot in the sky but it was traveling in a north direction. the red dot was 3 fingers distance and one tenth the size from the bright white light.
content.summary: Bright light turn red in north wilmington,ma

content.detailedDescription:
My location is katy, texas. sighting around fry road/morton road. at about 9:40,i went outside to feed my cats. i briefly walked off the back of my deck into the yard to look at the stars. it was slightly window and tree branchs were in the way. so i walked back up the deck and was going to go down the step in the front to see if i could see better. before i got down the steps i noticed a bright orange light in the distance. i wasnt sure at first what it was until it started to move up. my mind quickly decided it could not be an airplane because it was too low to the ground, there was no noise and it was going straight up, not horizontally upwards. i got really excited and could not believe it. i ran inside to get my camera and binoculars and yelled to my son to come outside quick. my camera was right inside the door on a table. i had to go farther for the binoculars. estimated time i was inside was 10 seconds. when i went back out with my son, he was in awe and i just kept saying i cant believe it! we watched as it moved up higher and higher. it was white when we came back out, not the orange color it was before. i looked like it deliberately was moving, not like shooting up wildly. we watched until it was out of site. out of site up in the sky - not in the horizon, straight up! there were many stars out and i could see a few stars and it seemed to just keep going farther than the stars. i know that is hard to tell, but that it what it looked like.
i could not see a shape. i was so excited and trying to get my camera working at the same time i didnt notice a shape. my son said it looked like 3 big lights not spaced very far apart in a triangle shape. i am not very good with distance. i can't say how far it was from me. there is a dirt/soil yard over in the direction where it came from. it literally looked as if it came off the ground from somewhere over there,thats how low it was. estimated time it took to go from ground to out of site, approximately 20 seconds. i really wish i could find out if anyone else in my area saw this.
content.summary: Very bright light rose from east beyond tree shot straight up

content.detailedDescription: On overcast dusk evening standing on my back deck, i observe a bright emerald colored sphere shape drop through cloud cover about 600 feet, then level off and and in 1 second was gone from sight. object flew on level path and appeared to have a green vapor trail about 8-10 feet long behind it as it sped off.
content.summary: Emerald colored sphere drops through cloud then shoots straight east

content.detailedDescription: Estaba cerca del worl trade center en mexico d.F ,brillaba mucho y se detubo unrato se escuchaba el paso de los aviones
content.summary: Brillante y redondo
